channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: The Road to LGBTI+ Inclusion in Germany - Progress at the Federal and Länder Levels
item.description: The Road to LGBTI+ Inclusion in Germany - Progress at the Federal and Länder Levels by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Wednesday 15 February 2023 at 14:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.description: Introduction Measures for Newly-Arrived Migrants by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Thursday 16 February 2023 at 9:30.

item.description: OECD Environmental Performance Reviews: Israel 2023 by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Wednesday 8 March 2023 at 9:00.

item.title: OECD Environmental Performance Reviews: Portugal 2023
item.description: OECD Environmental Performance Reviews: Portugal 2023 by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Tuesday 14 March 2023 at 9:00.
